faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Mr.Blu.

voiceToDocument.question: How does voice-to-document work?
voiceToDocument.answer: Simply tap the record button and describe your project naturally. Our AI listens to your voice, extracts key details like client info, pricing, and scope of work, then generates a professional document. You can review and edit before sending.

languages.question: What languages are supported?
languages.answer: Currently we support English and Spanish. You can speak in either language or even mix them - our AI understands both. The generated documents can be in your preferred language.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes, absolutely. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We use bank-level security and never share your information with third parties. Your documents and client data are yours alone.

clientSigning.question: Can clients sign without downloading an app?
clientSigning.answer: Yes! When you send a contract, your client receives a link they can open in any browser. They can review the document and sign with their finger - no app download required.

recurring.question: How do recurring invoices work?
recurring.answer: Set up a schedule (weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly) and Mr.Blu automatically generates and sends invoices to your recurring clients. You can choose to review before sending or let it run automatically.

customize.question: Can I customize my documents?
customize.answer: Absolutely. You can edit any document before sending, save custom templates, and add your business logo and signature. The AI-generated content is just a starting point - make it yours.
